document_data.title: Cult of the Dragon
document_data.author: [[Dale Donovan]]
document_data.Description:
''Cult of the Dragon'' is the 11{{th}} book in the [[FOR series]]. It delves into the lore, organization, and activities of its namesake, the [[Cult of the Dragon]].

The sourcebook provides detailed information about the origins, beliefs, and goals of the Cult of the Dragon. It explores the hierarchy and internal structure of the cult, including key figures, ranks within the organization, and various sects or factions that exist within it.

It provides insight into the various activities the cult undertakes to further its goals, including rituals, recruiting methods, alliances with evil dragons, and conflicts with other factions and organizations in the Realms. It includes detailed descriptions of notable members of the cult, as well as stats for various NPCs and monsters associated with the cult, such as dracoliches and cult fanatics. It also provides information on unique magical items and artifacts that are linked to the cult

''Cult of the Dragon'' offers Dungeon Masters ideas for integrating the Cult of the Dragon into their campaigns, including adventure hooks, plot ideas, and guidance on how to use the cult as a long-term adversary for player characters.
